channel.title: TAG 2018 - Registration Open
channel.description:
We are pleased to announce that registration for the TAG Meeting in Kathmandu is now open.
If you would like to register for the TAG Meeting 2018, please complete the registration form by **Tuesday, 2 October**.
By **5 October** you’ll receive an email confirming whether you have secured a place as well as information on the venue and accommodation options.
Please note that pre-registration is mandatory in order to attend the meeting.
[ **Register now here** ](https://aidtransparency.us3.list-manage.com/track/click?u=0e73fb60cf70bda74851aed09&id=2da64055c0&e=c4f27c51a0)
We'll be in touch very soon with a call for session proposals as well as more information about the format.

item.description:
We are pleased to announce that registration for the TAG Meeting in Kathmandu is now open.

If you would like to register for the TAG Meeting 2018, please complete the registration form by Tuesday, 2 October.

By 5 October you’ll receive an email confirming whether you have secured a place as well as information on the venue and accommodation options.

Please note that pre-registration is mandatory in order to attend the meeting.

Register now here
